General.Name: Garofalo Health Care S.p.A
General.Description: Garofalo Health Care S.p.A. operates healthcare clinics in Italy. It offers services in the areas of high-complexity surgery, medium- and low-complexity surgery, emergency surgery, medicine, clinical and interventional cardiology, and extended and intensive care units, as well as motor, neurological, cardiac, and nutritional rehabilitation. The company also operates centers for patients in coma and persistent vegetative states; and psychiatric and diagnostic centers. It operates healthcare centers located in Piedmont, Lombardy, Veneto, Friuli Venezia Giulia, Liguria, Emilia Romagna, Tuscany, and Lazio. The company is based in Rome, Italy. Garofalo Health Care S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Larama 98 S.p.A.
General.Address: Piazzale Belle Arti, 6, Rome, RM, Italy, 00196
